channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours

item.title: [+2834] What are these s... [PIC]
[+2785] Shatner Recites Palin's Farewell Speech on Conan O'brien
item.description: Sarah Palin's farewell speech did not seem to make any sense...until William Shatner read it as it was meant to be heard in all of its poetic beauty.

item.title: [+2343] Firefox 4.0: Early Screenshots Released
item.description: The pace at which Mozilla works can seem insane. It was less than a month ago when the the company released Firefox 3.5. But the ambition doesn’t end there. The Firefox team is looking even farther in the future: all the way to Firefox 4.0.

item.title: [+2336] Google Voice iPhone app rejected!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
item.description: GV Mobile developer Sean Kovacs relays a phone call he had with Apple where he was notified of his app being removed from the iTunes store for duplicating built-in iPhone features -- an app that was originally and purportedly approved by Phil Schiller himself.

item.title: [+2238] College Is Important Because... [PIC]
[+1897] Neighbor War: Get Your Lawn Chairs Off Your (Own) Lawn!
item.description: [Email Thread] Comical, insane escalation of lawn chair wars that began couple weeks ago. Guy who’s demanding his neighbor remove all lawn chairs – he’s only got 2 -- from his own lawn is out of his mind. Neighbor “victim” is pissed, but also funny, clever. [Email is long – but can read only parts to get it.]

item.title: [+1845] Blizzard Angered Hitler With No Starcraft 2 Lan Play
[+1409] Mom Builds 98-Inch Screen Inside Kid's Bedroom Ceiling
item.description: This is what great parents do when they want to take good care of their son, giving him all he needs to grow into a cultured, social, healthy young man: A 98-inch TV mounted flush inside his bedroom's ceiling.

item.title: [+1353] MILFs Eat Free! [PIC]
[+1287] Jon Stewart Nails Bill Kristol: Extended and Uncensored
item.description: On last night's Daily Show, Jon Stewart got arch-conservative Bill Kristol to admit that the government can provide better healthcare than the private sector.

item.title: [+1136] Hawaii Asserts Obama's U.S. Citizenship
item.description: State officials in Hawaii on Monday said they have once again checked and confirmed that President Barack Obama was born in Hawaii and is a natural-born American citizen, and therefore meets a key constitutional requirement for being president.

item.title: [+1085] The tweet the launched a $50K lawsuit.
item.description: A woman from Chicago is being sued for $50,000 over a complaint she posted on Twitter. Check out the tweet and decide for yourself if the suit is grounded.

item.title: [+907] Do You Know Why We Stopped You?
[+864] Slap Dance [GIF]
[+854] Why No One is Allergic to Wifi
item.description: Steve Miller, poor man, thinks he is allergic to Wifi. He told the Sun, as was reported on these pages this morning, that he has to avoid public places and can’t go to the pub or hotels because of the ubiquity of the ‘radiation’.

item.title: [+839] Free Anonymous BitTorrent With ItsHidden
item.description: With anti-piracy outfits warning those who share copyrighted content and ISPs threatening to pull the plug on alleged offenders, many file-sharers have decided to protect themselves by going anonymous. To accommodate this growing demand, ItsHidden is now offering a free VPN targeted at those who want to protect their privacy online.

item.title: [+820] Apparently, Even Algorithms Have a Sense of Humility [PIC]
item.description: Well, we all know who comes out on the top of the pile I suppose [hint!]

item.title: [+777] Dog refuses to leave house without shades
item.description: COOL canine Fei Fei left other dogs in the shade after his owner bought him a pair of sunglasses as a joke.
